scripts.test-ios: detox build --configuration ios.sim.debug && detox test --configuration ios.sim.debug

ios.sim.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -project ios/DetoxSample.xcodeproj -UseNewBuildSystem=NO -scheme DetoxSample -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -quiet
ios.sim.release.name: iPhone X

ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -project ios/DetoxSample.xcodeproj -UseNewBuildSystem=NO -scheme DetoxSample -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone X
